findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive permissions to withdraw any amount of LP tokens from Timelock contract and start/end presale at any time.

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward ZexReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.
